verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The seed of Abraham, that's who I am.
Risen from the dead unto his life.
No longer a slave. Brought up from the grave.
A stranger and a pilgrim in this world that I live in.
The seed of Abraham, that's who I am.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The Lord called Abraham out of Ur of the Chaldees.
Said go up to a land that I will show.
I'll multiply your seed, and meet your every need.
I'll make you the father of the faithful and the pure.
And blessing, I will bless you, Abraham

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Now separate thyself, my son, Abraham.
Consider not the deadness of the womb.
For Sarah shall bring forth a son to bear thy name.
All the families of the earth shall be blessed because of thee.
Stagger not at the promise, Abraham.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Now take thine only son up Moriah, Abraham.
And give him back to me upon the fire.
And though his body's dead, I'll raise him up again.
The resurrection that I bring will show him as the Son of God.
And conquer death forever, Abraham.
